arts.ttl: Kimmich thanks Bosnia-Herzegovina fans for warm reception in Nations League duel
arts.sum: After the full-time whistle last night, German national team captain Joshua Kimmich thanked the fans of hosting Bosnia & Herzegovina for providing a welcoming and fun atmosphere during Friday's Nations League duel.

arts.ttl: Undav double sees Germany hold off Bosnia
arts.sum: Germany forward Deniz Undav scored two first-half goals in six minutes to guide them to a 2-1 victory over Bosnia on Friday and keep them in top spot in their Nations League group.

arts.ttl: Undav scores twice for Germany in Nations League and Hungary holds Dutch to draw
arts.sum: Denis Undav scored a brace and the four-time World Cup winners extended their unbeaten record in the Nations League to three matches with a convincing 2-1 win at Bosnia-Herzegovina on Friday. His Stuttgart clubmate Maximilian Mittelstädt was the provider six minutes later with an excellent cross, and Undav doubled Germany’s lead with a clean tap-in from close range.

arts.ttl: Red Bull chief reveals truth behind Jurgen Klopp's 'Germany clause'
arts.sum: Red Bull director Oliver Mintzlaff has insisted there is no clause in Jurgen Klopp's contract allowing him to join the German national team. "I know Oli [Mintzlaff] very well, I can't imagine that the clause is in the contract - but I'll ask," he said.

arts.ttl: Bosnia-Herzegovina 1-2 Germany: Highlights, man of the match, stats from Nations League clash
arts.sum: Deniz Undav scores twice as Germany survive a late scare to defeat Bosnia-Herzegovina 2-1 in the UEFA Nations League at the Bilino Polje Stadium in Zenica.

arts.ttl: Undav brace proves the difference as Germany edge out Bosnia-Herzegovina
arts.sum: Bundestrainer Julian Nagelsmann's German Nationalmannschaft have maintained their undefeated start to the 2024/25 Nations League campaign with a 2-1 away win over Sergej Barbarez's Bosnia & Herzegovina. A B & H squad full of current and former Bundesliga professionals didn't make it easy for the visiting Germans, but VfB Stuttgart striker Deniz Undav ultimately proved a better finisher than his club teammate Ermedin Demirovic.

arts.ttl: Beier and Woltemade help Germany U21s punch ticket to summer Euros
arts.sum: Antonio di Salvo's Germany U21 side have officially qualified for the 2025 UEFA U21 European Championship next summer in Slovakia behind goals from Maximilian Beier and Nick Woltemade.
The team sheets for this evening's 2024/25 UEFA Nations League duel between Germany and Bosnia & Herzegovina have been released.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid, Barcelona 'suffer major blow' in Joshua Kimmich pursuit
arts.sum: Joshua Kimmich, who has been strongly linked with Barcelona and Real Madrid, is reportedly set to sign a new contract at Bayern Munich.

arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: Germany U21s vs. Bulgaria U21s
arts.sum: The team sheets for this evening's 2025 UEFA U21 European Championship qualification duel in Regensburg have been released.
